options: B na c ni ibisubizo by'ukuri
question: Iki cyapa gisobanura :
Iyo ubugari bw'inzira nyabagendwa igenderwamo n'ibinyabiziga budahagije kugirango  bibisikane nta nkomyi abagenzi bategetswe:
Ikinyabiziga ntigishobora kugira amatara arenga abiri y'ubwoko bumwe keretse  kubyerekeye amatara akurikira:
Ni gute umuyobozi w'ikinyabiziga yanyura kumunyegare hano?

Kubyerekeye kwerekana ibinyabiziga n'ukumurika kwabyo ndetse no kwerekana  ihindura ry'ibyerekezo byabyo, birabujijwe gukora andi matara cyangwa utugarura  rumuri, uretse ibitegetswe, ariko ibyo ntibireba amatara akurikira

options: Iyo nta cyapa cyo gutambuka mbere gihari
Iyo ikimenyetso kimurika cyagenewe ibinyabiziga kidakora
A na B ni ibisubizo by'ukuri
question: Ni ryari itegeko rigenga gutambuka mbere kw'iburyo rikurikizwa mu masangano:
Iyo hatarimo indi myanya birabujijwe gutwara ku ntebe y'imbere y'imodoka abana  badafite imyaka ikurikira

options: iyo umuhanda umurikiwe umuyobozi abasha kureba muri m 200
question: Amatara maremare y'ikinyabiziga agomba kutamurika mu bihe bikurikira:

options: A na B ni ibisubizo by'ukuri
question: Icyapa kibuza kunyura kubindi binyabiziga byose uretse ibinyamitende ibiri  n'amapikipiki adafite akanyabiziga ku ruhande gifite ibimenyetso by'amabara akurikira:

options: Mu guhindura icyerekezo iyo ari nijoro hatabona
Mu gihindura icyerekezo ibumoso cyangwa iburyo
question: Itara ndangacyerekezo rikoreshwa ryari?
Ni ryari ikinyabiziga gishobora kugenda mu muhanda moteri itaka cyangwa vitesi  idakora:
Ikinyabiziga kibujijwe gugagarara akanya kanini mu muhanda aho ugabanyijemo  ibisate bigaragazwa n'iki?

options: Mu tuyira turi ku musezero w'umuhanda
question: Iyo hatari utuyira two ku mpande z'umuhanda cyangwa inkengero zigiye hejuru,  cyangwa bidashobora kugendwa, abanyamaguru bagomba kunyura aha hakurikira

options: Hakurikijwe icyo ibyo bimenyetso bigamije kwerekana
question: Ibimenyetso bimurika byerekana uburyo bwo kugendera mu muhanda  kw'ibinyabiziga bishyirwa iburyo bw'umuhanda. Ariko bishobora no gushyirwa  ibumoso cyangwa hejuru y'umuhanda:

options: A na B ni ibisubizo by'ukuri
question: Birabujijwe guhagarara akanya kanini aha hakurikira:
Iki cyapa gisobanura iki ?
Iyo umuvuduko w'ibinyabiziga bidapakiye udashobora kurenga 50km mu isaha  ahategamye ibikoresho by'ihoni byumvikanira ku ntera ingana ite?

Amatara ndangambere n'aya ndanganyuma y'imodoka zitarengeje m 6 z'uburebure  na m 2 z'ubugari habariwemo imitwaro kdi nta kinyabiziga kindi kiziritseho  ashobora gusimburwa n'amatara akurikira, iyo ibyo binyabiziga bihagaze umwanya  muto cyangwa munini mu nsisiro bibangikanye ku ruhande rw'umuhanda:

options: Hakurikijwe icyo ibyo bimenyetso bigamije kwerekana
question: Ibimenyetso bimurika byerekana uburyo bwo kugendera mu muhanda kw'ibinyabiziga  bishyirwa iburyo bw'umuhanda. Ariko bishobora no gushyirwa ibumoso cyangwa  hejuru y'umuhanda:
Iki cyapa gisobanura iki mu nzira nyabagenwa?
